title: Litecoin History
markdown: Litecoin was created by Charlie Lee in October 2011. It is a peer-to-peer cryptocurrency that enables instant, near-zero cost payments to anyone in the world.

title: Litecoin Features
markdown: Litecoin features include: Faster block times (2.5 minutes vs Bitcoin's 10 minutes), Scrypt mining algorithm, Segregated Witness (SegWit) support, and Lightning Network compatibility.

title: Litecoin vs Bitcoin
markdown: Litecoin differs from Bitcoin in several ways: faster block generation (2.5 minutes vs 10 minutes), different hashing algorithm (Scrypt vs SHA-256), and higher maximum supply (84 million vs 21 million).

title: MWEB Privacy
markdown: MimbleWimble Extension Blocks (MWEB) is an opt-in privacy upgrade for Litecoin launched in 2022. It enables confidential transactions where amounts are hidden and uses CoinJoin to mix transactions for enhanced privacy.

title: Draft Document
markdown: This is a draft document that should not appear in search results. It contains test content about Litecoin mining.
